DOC.brief_summary: This prospective , observational study design describe disease progression , symptom change , quality life , diet lifestyle habit , frequency adverse event among patient multiple sclerosis ( MS ) use complementary alternative medicine ( CAM ) . In addition describing pattern CAM use , study also identify describe positive deviant , individual high quality life least amount disease activity .
